sentences.en: a soundly based conclusion
sentences.cn: 有充分依据的结论

sentences.en: After much discussion we came at a conclusion satisfactory to all.
sentences.cn: 经过充分讨论,我们得出了大家都很满意的结论.

sentences.en: All the evidence pointed to the conclusion that he was guilty.
sentences.cn: 所有证据都表明他是有罪的。

sentences.en: As opinions vary, no unanimous conclusion can be drawn.
sentences.cn: 众说纷纭, 莫衷一是.

sentences.en: At the conclusion of the meeting, little progress had been made.
sentences.cn: 会议开到最后，没有取得多少进展。

sentences.en: He came to the conclusion that the machine was out of order.
sentences.cn: 他断定机器出了毛病.

sentences.en: He drew the conclusion by building on his own investigation.
sentences.cn: 他根据自己的调查研究作出结论.

sentences.en: I found the conclusion of his book very interesting.
sentences.cn: 我觉得他这本书的结尾很有趣.

sentences.en: I've come to the conclusion that he's not the right person for the job.
sentences.cn: 我断定他不适合做这项工作。

sentences.en: in conclusion, it is clear that the market is maturing.
sentences.cn: 总之，市场正日趋成熟这一点十分清楚。

sentences.en: It is still too early to reach a conclusion on this point.
sentences.cn: 在这一点上作出结论还为时过早。

sentences.en: It's almost a foregone conclusion that you'll get what you want.
sentences.cn: 你将得到你想要的，这几乎是确定无疑的。

sentences.en: It’s important not to jump to conclusions .
sentences.cn: 决不要贸然下结论。

sentences.en: It’s important not to jump to conclusions.
sentences.cn: 决不要贸然下结论。

sentences.en: Most voters believe the result is a foregone conclusion.
sentences.cn: 多数投票者认为这个结果是意料之中的。

sentences.en: No conclusion should be drawn before all the facts are buttoned down.
sentences.cn: 所有事实弄清以前,不应该下任何结论.

sentences.en: No final conclusion has yet been reached on this matter.
sentences.cn: 这个问题尚无定论.

sentences.en: Some people jumped rashly to the conclusion that something must be wrong.
sentences.cn: 有些人轻率地得出结论说一定是出了什么问题.

sentences.en: The championship result was almost a foregone conclusion.
sentences.cn: 锦标赛的结果差不多在意料之中。

sentences.en: the conclusion of a peace treaty
sentences.cn: 和平条约的签订

sentences.en: The judge's conclusion was plainly wrong.
sentences.cn: 法官的结论明摆着是错的。

sentences.en: The police came to the inescapable conclusion that the children had been murdered.
sentences.cn: 警方得出了无法回避的结论: 这些儿童被谋杀了。

sentences.en: There are perhaps two main conclusions to be drawn from the above discussion.
sentences.cn: 从以上的讨论也许可以得出两个主要的结论。

sentences.en: These are the report’s main conclusions.
sentences.cn: 这些就是这篇报告的主要结论。

sentences.en: You arrived at your conclusion using the methods of formal logic.
sentences.cn: 你这个结论是按照形式逻辑的方法推论出来的.

words.tran_cn: 决定性的；最后的；确实的；确定性的
结束；推断；作结论（conclude的过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: vt. 结束（使终止）；谈定（买卖等）
意识到了；得出相同的结论
预料之中必然发生的事情；不可避免的结局
最后；总之，总而言之；综上所述

phrases.phrase: jump (或 leap) to conclusions (或 the conclusion tha

phrases.tran_cn: 得出结论；达成一个结论
(正式)与…一比高低；与…一决胜负

trans.tran_cn: 结论，结束，末尾，结局，签订
trans.tran_en: something you decide after considering all the information you have
